# import module we'll need to import our custom module
from shutil import copyfile

# copy our file into the working directory (make sure it has .py suffix)
copyfile(src = "../input/total-fashion-mnist-cnn-class-py/define_class_fashionmnistcnn_py.py", dst = "../working/define_class_fashionmnistcnn_py.py")

from define_class_fashionmnistcnn_py import *
source.2cf1b73c:
fmCNN = FashionMnistCNN()
fmCNN.initCNN(32,3,True)
fmCNN.addCNN(64,3,True)
fmCNN.flatten()
fmCNN.addDense(100)
fmCNN.dropOut(0.4)
fmCNN.addSoftmaxDense(10)
fmCNN.trainModel(20)
model = fmCNN.getModel()
history = fmCNN.getModelHistory()
